item.title: Exploiting GeoServer path traversal vulnerability (CVE-2023-41877)
item.author: Anthares101
item.description: Exploiting GeoServer path traversal vulnerability (CVE-2023-41877) Before starting, remember that performing any of the attacks explained in this post to networks without previous consent is illegal, this post information is for educational purposes only. What is Geoserver? Geoserver is an open-source software server written in Java that allows users to share and edit geospatial data. Designed for interoperability, it publishes data from any major spatial data source using open standards.
